description: PEAK is a multiplayer climbing game where you and your friends must reach the summit of a procedurally generated mountain.

0.4.2.description:
### DEATH LINK FIXED

- Options are kill_random_player and reset_to_last_checkpoint
Reset to last checkpoint is leftover from previous repo, untested but in theory should send all players in the lobby back to checkpoint/campfire.
Kill random player will kill a random player in the lobby.

- Egg and Egg Turkey (the Turkey you get from the Egg sometimes) have been added as checks.
- Visual improvements to Progressive Stamina with afflictions. (still not perfect)

- Non working items from previous repo were commented out from the pool for now.

- Item Received Messages and Server Messages will appear in the top left

Please report all issues so I can **crush** them. 


### Things you as players should try breaking for me :) 

- Sending OUT DeathLinks

- Automatic Goal Completion for all 3 goals

- Checks for all items incase any are missing

### Installation
Install the apworld into your Archipelago Installation
Extract the folder from the zip into your PEAK\BepInEx\plugins\ folder
0.4.2.title: Peak AP 0.4.2 (alpha)

0.4.5.description:
# LINK TO THE PEAK

- Beehive and Honeycomb item checks
- New traps (some exclusive to TrapLink)
- Death Link sending & receiving
- Trap Link sending & receiving
- Ring Link sending & receiving
- Improved & simplified AP UI for connecting

I want to include HardRingLink and EnergyLink but I need to come up with some ideas on how to handle them.

## Ring Link
If a full Stamina Bar is 100 Rings, then 1 Ring is 0.01 Stamina.
Eat food to send out Rings to linked players.
Rings they send will fill (or deduct) your Extra Stamina Bar, but if you dont have that, negative ring amounts will drain your stamina.

## Trap Link
I thought this was PEAK not PAIN.

## Please report all issues so I can **crush** them. 
### Things you as players should try breaking for me :) 
- everything as this is still alpha and I can only test so much on my own!

### Installation
Install the apworld into your Archipelago Installation
Extract the folder from the zip into your PEAK\BepInEx\plugins\ folder
0.4.5.title: Peak AP 0.4.5 (alpha)

0.4.6.description:
# BUG FIXING ON ROOTS EVE

- Item Acquiring checks now send from other players in the lobby without the mod
- Status Affliction Traps can now affect other players in the lobby
- Stamina Bar fixes & visual improvements
- Received Items/Traps will now queue up until you're on the SHORE
- This queue also mitigates against crashes caused by games releasing a **lot** of checks at once
- Acquire Big Egg, Cooked Bird, Egg (The sunny side up one) and Scorpion checks
- Fixed reaching the PEAK goal with Ascents goal as 0
- Fixed received Items/Traps repeating on each session


# Known Issues
Luggage Checks don't count from other players
Swap Trap can have inconsistent results
Progressive Stamina Bars may not affect other players in the lobby
Only the host can see AP related messages

## Please report all issues so I can **crush** them. 
### Things you as players should try breaking for me :) 
- everything as this is still alpha and I can only test so much on my own!

### Installation
Install the apworld into your Archipelago Installation
Extract the folder from the zip into your PEAK\BepInEx\plugins\ folder
0.4.6.title: Peak AP 0.4.6 (alpha)

0.4.7.description:
# ROOTS UPDATE

- Luggage checks working in multiplayer (Without the mod too)
- AP Messages can be seen by others with the mod
- Progressive stamina working with others with the mod
- Fixed affliction traps not working on other players
- Fixed Death Links not sending due to the ROOTS update
- Added Badge checks for the ROOTS update badges
- Added Acquire Item checks for ROOTS update items
- Removed the unused Acquire Campfire check
- Added some new traps related to the ROOTS update
- Added missing item check(s): Marshmallow
- AP UI will change when joining a server to be less obtrusive

(some vagueness to keep from spoiling ROOTS update content)


# Known Issues
None at this time but that could change! Please report anything you find!

## Please report all issues so I can **crush** them. 
### Things you as players should try breaking for me :) 
- everything as this is still alpha and I can only test so much on my own!

### Installation
Install the apworld into your Archipelago Installation
Extract the folder from the zip into your PEAK\BepInEx\plugins\ folder
0.4.7.title: Peak AP 0.4.7 (alpha)

0.4.8.description:
# BUG FIXING

- Fixed save state loading was happening too early resulting in mixed up or duplicate Luggage Checks
- DeathLink Checkpoint behavior should now be working properly using behavior borrowed from Checkpoint Flags
- Fixed ROOTS Ascent badge checks that weren't sending properly
- HardRingLink support for certain conditions


# Known Issues
None

## Please report all issues so I can **crush** them. 

### Installation
Install the apworld into your Archipelago Installation
Extract the folder from the zip into your PEAK\BepInEx\plugins\ folder
0.4.8.title: Peak AP 0.4.8 (alpha)

0.4.9-rc.1.description:
Updated apworld for 0.6.4
Fixes for a bunch of item checks.
Fix for Cooking Badge and Bouldering Badge checks
Fix for Death Link crashing in Airport
EnergyLink support started but still not where I want it to be quite yet
Goal Locations seperated from Badge Checks
Individual Trap Weights
Some missing Badge checks added
Ascent Unlock and Badge Unlocks will save/load properly
Ascent Unlocks can activate while in the game
A few new traps :)

### KNOWN ISSUES
Some badges that are tracked via stats on Steam Achievements may not report being checked when they are earned
Trying to gather a list of these ones so I can implement specific handling for each of them
0.4.9-rc.1.title: Peak AP 0.4.9-rc.1 (alpha)

0.5.0.description:
### PROGRESSIVE ENERGY

Updated apworld for 0.6.4
Fixes for a bunch of item checks.
Fix for Cooking Badge and Bouldering Badge checks
Fix for Death Link crashing in Airport
Goal Locations separated from Badge Checks
Individual Trap Weights
Some missing Badge checks added
Ascent Unlock and Badge Unlocks will save/load properly
Ascent Unlocks are now Progressive Ascent
    - Ascent Unlocks can activate while in the game
    - Ascent Completion checks wont populate past your selected Ascent Level if your goal is Reach Peak
A handful of new traps :)
Save state handling reworked to use a generated UUID based on the archipelagos session instead of just the server and port

## Energy Link Support
- An Energy Link Store/Vendor will appear at each Campfire if EnergyLink is enabled
- You can spend 300 units of Energy to make it spit out a bundle thats been randomly selected
- Almost anything you pick up can now be Converted into Energy if you don't want or need it
- Each Vendor is a one time use for that run


### KNOWN ISSUES
Some badges that are tracked via stats on Steam Achievements may not report being checked when they are earned
Trying to gather a list of these ones so I can implement specific handling for each of them where needed
0.5.0.title: Peak AP 0.5.0 (alpha)

0.5.1.description:
# Hotfix update

- Prevent DeathLink from happening while players are still waking up on the SHORE beach
- Fix load state order of operations happening in the wrong order 
- Prevent progressive stamina from ever setting below the minimum max value
0.5.1.title: Peak AP 0.5.1 (alpha)

0.5.2.description:
# Hotfix update again
  • Hotfix for Traps not working if TrapLink was disabled
  • Hotfix for assetbundle loading when downloaded through a mod manager
  • Luggage Checks Per Run now properly resets
  • EnergyLink wasn't properly communicating with the server
  • Item mapping changed to IDs for more consistent results
  • Yeet Trap needed updating due to one of the later post ROOTS updates
0.5.2.title: Peak AP 0.5.2 (alpha)

0.5.3.description:
### MORE FIXES
  • hotfix for items sometimes not sending until the next run
  • hotfix for progressive stamina bars not loading properly
  • hotfix for progressive stamina bars not being received until the airport
  • Sudden disconnects will attempt reconnection
  • AP UI will reset if reconnect attempts fail showing the Connection UI
0.5.3.title: Peak AP 0.5.3 (alpha)

0.5.4.description:
# PROGRESSION AND LOGIC
  • DeathLink would send out even if disabled
  • Gust Trap would change based on biome of the day
  • 6 New Traps
  • Options to disable 3 different groups of Badges (Multiplayer, Difficult and Biome Specific)
    Difficult will not remove 24 Karat Badge and Biome Specific will not remove the Nomad, Forestry, Alpinist or Trailblazer badges
  • State saving won't happen if you aren't the host
  • Progressive Endurance: Each one reduces the rate you use up Stamina, allowing you to climb more for less!
  • Progressive Mountain: Each one allows you to progress to the next biome. The campfire will not clear the fog if you don't have enough of these!
  • Fixed Nomad II and Forestry II checks
  • Checks for some missing items (Clusterberries, Kingberries, Napberry, Scoutmaster's Bugle, Tick, Cloud Fungus)
  • Getting Checks for an Ascent level will reward all previous level checks as well
  • Added new logic for all the Progression items
# NEXT UPDATE PLANS
  • Difficult Badge preset will remove 24 Karat Badge if goal isn't 24 Karat Badge
  • Biome Specific preset will remove the Nomad, Trailblazer, etc. badges
  • as always more traps for TrapLink
  • any missing item checks I forgot about (Berrynana Peels I still haven't added the variants of)
  • probably bug fixing and logic improvements lol
0.5.4.title: Peak AP 0.5.4 (alpha)

0.5.5.description:
# SYNC FIX
  • fixed Progressive Mountain not syncing to joined player(s)
  • fixed Progressive Stamina not resyncing properly on joined player(s)
# NEXT UPDATE PLANS
  • Difficult Badge preset will remove 24 Karat Badge if goal isn't 24 Karat Badge
  • Biome Specific preset will remove the Nomad, Trailblazer, etc. badges
  • as always more traps for TrapLink
  • any missing item checks I forgot about (Berrynana Peels I still haven't added the variants of)
  • probably bug fixing and logic improvements lol
0.5.5.title: Peak AP 0.5.5 (alpha)

0.5.6.description:
# MORE FIXINS
  • Fixed checks for Tick, Airline Food, Pirate's Compass
  • High Altitude and Participation Badges were missing checks
  • Item pickup check sending performance improved
  • Item spawning performance improved
  • Berrynana Peel checks
  • Logic fixes for some Badges
  • Redundancy check for Progressive Ascent to prevent accessing higher ascents than you should
  • Fix for Progressive Mountain ignoring the campfire before THE KILN
  • More Open X Luggage checks
  • Fix for Calcium Intake Badge not working
  • Fix for Toxicology Badge not working
  • New goal for Reaching # Ascent AND Collecting # Badges
0.5.6.title: Peak AP 0.5.6 (alpha)

0.5.7.description:
# CUSTOM TRIVIA & FIXES
  • Clamped RingLink/HardRingLink extra stamina gains
  • Fixed mouse cursor not being confined to game window
  • Config option to toggle DeathLink (assuming its enabled in the AP slot)
  • Config option to spawn the last X items received from AP on the SHORE (Traps & Progressive items are ignored)
  • Multiplayer only items have been added to the loot tables all the time
  • Custom Trivia Trap has been added. View the GUIDE for more info.
0.5.7.title: Peak AP 0.5.7 (alpha)

0.5.8.rc-1.description:
## v0.5.8.rc-1
  • Items are locked and won't spawn until they are first recieved through AP
  • Some potential mitigation against crashing due to picking up items and releasing games
  • Zoom Trap protections incase it gets stuck active
  • AP Connection UI will now only show once hosting the game
  • Campfires will show a hint to Progressive Mountain
  • Potential fix for Daredevil Badge not triggering
0.5.8.rc-1.title: Peak AP 0.5.8-rc.1 (alpha)

0.5.8.rc-2.description:
## v0.5.8.rc-2
  • fix for 24 Karat Badge logic which now requires Kiln access
  • Blowgun was missing from items list woops
  • some potential logic fixes for Item Unlocking
0.5.8.rc-2.title: Peak AP 0.5.8-rc.2 (alpha)
